title: First Table
text: Shows a list of available items that can be sorted or filtered. It is possible to drag rows to the second table and insert them there at a certain position.

title: Second Table
text: Shows the selected items. Sorting of the columns has been disabled. The table is sorted by a rank property. When the dragged row is dropped, the rank is changed, and the row appears at the drop position.

title: Buttons
text: Currently drag and drop is only a usability feature, and an accessible alternative must be provided. Therefore, buttons have been added to move rows between the tables or to reorder rows within the second table.
